locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Constant issue with showers being crowded 10+ in line, will loves ever build adequate showers for their stops? Probably not, no one should have to wait 2 1/2 hours to take a shower. Either build adequate facilities or impose strict time ‚Ä¶
Walked into the bathroom to shower and there was poop and pubes on the toilet seat.  Bathroom clearly wasn‚Äôt cleaned. June 28th 3:29 pm. Teach your employees how to properly clean please!

Took a shower here about 2 am mid week. . Shower was nasty. Whiskers all over the sink and the counter. Toilet had some poo splatter and was dirty round the bowl. Floor was nasty and trash had hair in it. Shower had scum all over on the ‚Ä¶

By far the worst experience having a shower in a long time, water wasn't hot, no pressure and it made my skin irritated. Honestly this loves should be shut down for remodel or something. Embarrassing....completely Embarrassing

‚Ä¶ with an RV, this would be a convenient location to stop. Loves usually has propane, water, and sometimes dump station. I didn‚Äôt check to see if they had a dump station or shower. Probably would be okay to boondock for a short time. ‚Ä¶
Not a great shower experience, water pressure was barely noticeable, toilet barely flushed.  Had to hit a few times to get the piss down.  *I solely rate on shower water pressure*

‚Ä¶ wash clothes and this is the second one i came to and no laundry a waste of time then I went to take a shower and the shower slightly gets warm ..they are not truck stops, they are gas stations with truck parking and truck repair...come ‚Ä¶

If I could give zero stars - I would!
Stopped here to take a shower - awful experience!
Water irritated skin.
Hardly any hot water.
This Love‚Äôs needs to be closed down.
Mold. Lots of dust. Hair on walls.
See pictures.
YUCK!
GO ELSEWHERE!

‚Ä¶ for professional drivers to wash clothes is a necessity. To top it off this location is far from a clean or friendly location. Guess I'm taking another shower and putting dirty clothes back on but this time the shower isn't even sanitary.

Disappointed with this loves- after a long day of driving I pulled in to shower and the showers here are not clean. The floor definitely hadn't been swept and the shower curtain smelled like mildew. The parking lot is ffilthy.i expect more ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ holding company driver. This is not good business. This caused me a lot of trouble and effort to find another place to park for the night and didn't get a shower either. I will not be stopping at this location again. I'm just being generous ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Well after spending over 100 dollars at this location from Friday night to Sunday afternoon and using my shower credits.  I was told to leave and I explained to him that I spend alot of money in these stores and I am a loyal customer.  All ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ I was in the shower, came back, and there‚Äôs a bastard walking around my truck trying to steal it!!! ‚Ä¶

The workers at the nuclear pilot are lazy. I ordered a shower and 2 hours have already passed and the line has not moved. I ask the manager to pay attention to the work of this establishment. And I will continue to wait,ü§¨ ‚Ä¶
I waited in line for over an hour, no one cleaned the shower, zero serviceüëéüëéüëéüëéüëé ‚Ä¶

This place sucks. Pilot you can do better. Showers are always empty. Always dirty 45 minute. Wait to get one person to clean a shower. Hardly any parking fuel prices high as anywhere in the state of Tennessee. I‚Äôm done with this pilot ‚Ä¶
This Pilot is always closed. It is very inconvenient no shower until 6am. Store closed until 5am. Very limited parking for truckers

‚Ä¶ Arkansas. The outside has trash everywhere, especially along the perimeter of the property. The showers also really need to be cleaned with a pressure washer and some soap. There are holes in the tile walls in the shower room, and signs of ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ However, the shower was clean and hot, beverage station has good variety, and staff is friendly. Just expect to have to get creative with parking if you come this way, which seems to be a problem anywhere 50mi or less from Nashville.

In the 20 min I was in the shower I had employees knock on the door 3 times. But I had to shake dry like a dog because they didn't put a towel in the bathroom. Make sure you double check before taking a shower here.

locations.title: Big Rig Parking
locations.content: Big Rig Parking may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: An oasis in the middle of nowhere (for trucks), this place is close enough to a Loves to grab a shower.  I've stayed here twice and each time the money I paid was worth it when watching the chaos of Loves across the street.  We need more of ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the street at Love‚Äôs. Honestly it would be great if there was more locations like this. Next to a truck stop. I don‚Äôt mind paying for parking. I just need a safe place to park. Bonus there‚Äôs a shower across the street at love‚Äôs. Thank you

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ of the nastiest truck stops I've been to. Fuel island was an oil slick. Obviously hadn't been cleaned in a coons age. Showers were disgusting. Very hastily "cleaned" not swept/ mopped mirror was filthy mold everywhere and the shower ‚Ä¶
Front desk, both ladies are unhelpful.  I asked them my truck smart isn't working, and I want to use my phone number for rewards to get a shower, but they keep refusing to help me.

‚Ä¶ parking lot, hire weaklings as security guards to enforce it. I paid for a spot but spent no penny on any other service. Not even shower, the place is nasty. 27 miles away is Loves, do yourself a favor and bypass unless you have emergency.
Not sure where to start. I will just say Shower wasn‚Äôt cleaned but I guess the person brought the bottle in to start on it. 95% of this place is reserved parking and is pre booked.

‚Ä¶ Cashier on May 7, 2024 at 9:28 pm was completely rude. We went to get a shower and the machine for whatever reason didn't print the receipt.  So my husband went up to ask for help. She reluctantly helped him and after of course, followed up ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ All the bathrooms were shut down at the same time‚Ä¶only option for ladies was to sneak in to a used shower stall. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ year I've come to Nashville on the weekends and worked for Uber and Lyft. I sleep in your parking lot and pay for a shower every night and fuel up every morning. Only to be told by a new security guard that I'm trespassing after a length ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ money out of truck drivers. This TA in particular is no different. Also, we tried to take a showers the next morning at 5:30 am before the morning rush and we were told that we couldn't shower. Why, you ask? Well, I'll tell you. Apparently ‚Ä¶
TA at antioch staff asking for diver license / ID to buy a shower..

locations.content: I-24 Truck and Auto Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Stopped passing through for gas, restroom and shower. They have 4 showers which were clean, spacious, has a toilet, sink/vanity mirror, and separate area for a shower. The water pressure was good, hot water was hot, and cold water was cold. ‚Ä¶

This place is terrible . They ask to hold your drivers license or truck keys when you take a shower .... in case you run off with the shower key or one of their 20 yr old towels. If you get a cup of ice they charge you for a drink and the ‚Ä¶
Descant haven‚Äôt stopped n a while shower was $9.88 towels wore out very small my maultise bigger than towel . In shower smelled a lot of sewage no chair I recommend getting shower else where

The shower sucks! No water pressure! But very hot.
Plenty of overnight parking. Plus, parking across the street at Walmart.
Nice place took my shower there only thing missing was a chair or bench for me I'm old butt...need to sit and put my shoes on lol.
Good place restaurant shower food everything Lara parking  Not too far motel cross the street Walmart
Truck parking, shower's, good food, and competitive prices. Great location and great place.
Nice place to park and grab a drink and a snack clean shower
Good place to rest and take a shower and relax
Took a shower. Could have used some more cleaning. Water would lose temperature
